channel.title: startups on Josh Wulf
channel.description: Recent content in startups on Josh Wulf

item.title: How to Recruit for your Startup: Tech Cofounder
item.description: I’m at the Investor Pitch night at The Triffid, in Brisbane’s Fortitude Valley. Apparently over 500 people have turned out for the event (someone says it is closer to 1000), and it is packed. Not even standing room. People are spilling out of the event space into the bar. Inside, Venture Capitalists are pitching a panel of startup founders — a reversal of the usual roles. I make my way through the crowd.

item.title: The Second System Effect and Scaleup Failure
item.description: This article was originally posted on Medium.com. You validated your product-market fit. Your MVP was a hit. You even have paying customers (I already said that, right — it’s validated). Then you started to develop the real deal, the product that built on your original success, while fixing the errors and short-cuts, and adding the cool new features — and it all fell apart. So what the f*&# went wrong?
